import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { Container, Button, Row, Form, Col, ListGroup, Badge, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import FormGroupPostal from "../components/FormGroupPostal"; import FormGroupProvince from "../components/FormGroupProvince"; import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext"; import { useCart } from "../contexts/CartContext"; export default function Checkout() { const { currentUser } = useAuth(); const { cartItems, subTotal, taxCost, shippingCost, totalCost } = useCart(); const streetRef = useRef(); const cityRef = useRef(); const provinceRef = useRef(); const postalCodeRef = useRef(); const history = useHistory(); function handleClick() { history.push("/cart"); } return (

Checkout

Your Cart {cartItems.length}

{cartItems.map((item) => { return ( {item.productName} ${(item.price * item.qty).toFixed(2)} ); })} Total (incl. shipping & tax) ${totalCost.toFixed(2)}

Billing Address

Name Address Address 2 (Optional) City

Payment

Name on card Full name as displayed on card Credit card number Expiry month Expiry year CVV
); }
